title: Oath of Vengeance
content:
3. The Oath of Vengeance Paladin's primary Ability is Strength, their Saving Throw proficiencies are Wisdom & Charisma and they have a Hit Dice of 1d10 per Paladin level. They have proficiency with Simple Weapons, Martial Weapons, and all Armor and Shields.

You have set aside even your own purity to right wrongs and deliver justice to those who have committed the most grievous sins.

BG3 Paladin Class Features

Hit Points at 1st level: 10 + Constitution modifier Hit Points at Higher Levels: 6 +
